Debbie, I just wanted to say a personal hi to you.  It's taken me awhile to=
 recognize that you're the same Debbie whose website I've been visiting for=
 so long.  Your recordings are incredible!  I'm new here and am learning a =
lot, though I've only recorded EVP on a digital voice recorder so far.  It'=
s amazing what everyone here is accomplishing.

Robin


  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: misujoey<mailto:misujoey@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Monday, January 14, 2=
008 3:51 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Question ..


  Does anyone find that each=
 "Box" has a different group of people 
  speaking and helping?

  I've swe=
pt "Manually", used the "MiniBox" and the "SuperBox" and there 
  seems to =
be a different set of people on each device. 

  Thanks,

  Debbie
